about.p: Hey, what's up? I am a Systems Engineering student at the Santa María University, I am also a programmer and web developer specialized in the Frontend area. Currently I do projects as a freelancer.

ui.ui0: Why invest in a web page?
ui.ui1: Currently the digital world has grown by leaps and bounds, as a result of the covid-19 pandemic, since 2020 the planet has advanced 6 years in the digital world.
ui.ui2: Remember that a website is not an expense, but an investment for your business. To make your investment worthwhile, you need to make sure your website is professionally designed, fully functional with fast download speeds, and packed with great content.
ui.ui3: Among the most important benefits of having a website we have:
ui.ui6: Efficient way to promote your business
ui.ui10: Stay one step ahead of the competition

web.web0: But… what is a web page?
web.web1: A web page is an electronic document or information capable of containing text, sound, video, programs, links, images, hyperlinks and many other things, adapted for the so-called World Wide Web (internet), and that can be accessed through a web browser. (such as a computer, smartphone, etc).
web.web2: Said web page is hosted on a hosting and is accessible through a web domain.
web.web3: Specifically, hosting is the storage space where the files that make up your website are housed, and the domain is the name with which your visitors will access it.

cont.cont0: What does my website creation service contain?
cont.cont3: Fully customized page or website for the client.
cont.cont5: From 1 to 5 different sections within the website.
